summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, providing for construction of trolley poles and wires along the No. 43-Montlake/Ballard trolley route in conjunction with the City's North 46th Street/Green Lake Way North Project; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts, increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund.
